name: Gradient-Centralization-TensorFlow
shortDescription: Use just 2 lines of code to instantly improve your model training performance on certain tasks by upto 70% and moderate training time and generalization improvements! Implements Gradient Centralization in TensorFlow and makes it availaible as a Python Package to easily use it.
longDescription: Use just 2 lines of code to instantly improve your model training performance on certain tasks by upto 70% and moderate training time and generalization improvements! Implements Gradient Centralization in TensorFlow and makes it availaible as a Python Package to easily use it.
